name: Arden Levine
bio: Arden Levine’s poems have appeared in AGNI, Barrow Street, the Missouri Review, Sixth Finch, Sycamore Review, Rattle, RHINO, and Washington Square Review. Her work has also been featured in Ted Kooser’s “American Life in Poetry” and NPR's Radiolab. She reads for the journal Epiphany and directs capacity-building projects and programs for nonprofit organizations and government agencies. Born in Washington, DC, Levine lives in Brooklyn.
